General.Name: Ironveld Plc
General.Description: Ironveld Plc, an exploration and development company, engages in mining, exploring, processing, and smelting vanadiferous and titaniferous magnite. The company owns an interest in the iron, vanadium, and titanium project located on the Northern Limb of the Bushveld Complex in Limpopo Province, South Africa. Ironveld Plc was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Caerphilly, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: De Clare House, Caerphilly, United Kingdom, CF83 3HU
